title: German Business Communication Mastery Course for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners are practitioners with current or upcoming work experience with German companies, aiming to improve job-linked language proficiency

learning_goals: Construct grammatically accurate sentences without errors when writing German business emails and reports.

By studying German for five hours per week over six months, learners achieve CEFR B1-level business German proficiency, specifically: 1) conducting 10+ minute conversations on work-related topics (contracts, project management) with 80% accuracy, 2) delivering a 5-minute German presentation and handling three or more Q&A sessions, and 3) successfully negotiating at least three core requirements in a simulated negotiation scenario (scoring 3+ out of 4 on evaluator rubrics).
Improve work efficiency by over 40% through the cultivation of German official document comprehension and intercultural communication skills.

resources: Customizable Business Scenario Database for Enterprises

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
